sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_12015b8edbc75f00abd4f9361d9619d2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.CarouselPlus</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>CarouselPlus</name><script><![CDATA[var CarouselPlus = Class.create();
CarouselPlus.prototype = {
  initialize: function() {},

  getSlides: function(group) {
    var grSlide = new GlideRecordSecure('u_carousel_plus');
    grSlide.addActiveQuery();
    grSlide.addQuery('u_group', group);
    grSlide.query();
    var slides = [];
    while (grSlide.next()) {
      slides.push({
        background: grSlide.u_background.getDisplayValue(),
        caption: grSlide.u_caption.toString(),
        height: grSlide.u_height.toString(),
        order: grSlide.u_order.toString(),
        url: grSlide.u_url.toString(),
        youTubeId: grSlide.u_youtube_id.toString()
      });
    }
    return slides;
  },

  type: 'CarouselPlus'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>steven.gregory</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-03 21:58:27</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>12015b8edbc75f00abd4f9361d9619d2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CarouselPlus</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_12015b8edbc75f00abd4f9361d9619d2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>steven.gregory</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-03 22:21:55</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: customc.carousel-plus { .fa-stack-2x { font-size: 3.5rem; } .carousel-control { align-items: center; display: flex; justify-content: center; } .img-slide { margin: auto; width: 100%; } .carousel-indicators { height: 25px; bottom: -0.5rem; z-index: 0; li { height: 12px; margin-left: 10px; width: 12px; } .active { margin: 1px 1px 1px 10px; } } .container { padding-left: 0; padding-right: 0; } } sp_instancefalsepe-carousel-plusfalsePE Carousel Plus[{"name":"group","section":"other","label":"Group","type":"string"}]falsefalsesp_widgetsteven.gregory2018-07-03 22:00:05falsec7f193cedbc75f00abd4f9361d96195322PE Carousel Plusglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_c7f193cedbc75f00abd4f9361d961953steven.gregory2018-07-03 22:55:16
